Banyan Advisory

Our business creates significant value for companies by helping them execute the right capitalization strategy

Banyan Advisory is an Investment Banking firm providing services in the areas of Private Equity Syndication, Mergers & Acquisitions advisory, Investor Relations services and Strategic Finance including restructuring of business. Backed by strong research driven activities, the company concentrates on providing services to small and medium Enterprises seeking accelerated growth and profitability. We aim to create significant value for entrepreneurs and mature companies by helping them execute the right capitalization strategy.

Our Services are dedicated to providing our clients with advices of highest quality and focus on quality implementation of the same. Our long standing relationship with the PE Funds across the globe, especially in India helps us to close transactions in aggressive time frames.
